descriptionHtml:
=======================================================================================
    Update  3 new swords from now on     Read this for Elven Great Blade Standalone version 2.0
=======================================================================================

What this mod does:
=============================================
Import 3 new swords Elven Great Blade

Installation Instructions:

Download the file:

1.Elven Great Blade Standalone 2.0
====================================================================================
1. go to **(your user name)**\\Documents and Settings\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

open the SkyrimPrefs.ini with the notepad
and put this line under the [Launcher] section

bEnableFileSelection=1

2.Unpack the mod to a known location like (Desktop).

3.Find the folder labeled \'Data\' within the mods files.

Copy data folder to your Skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

4.Start up Skyrim , and place a checkmark next to ElvenGreatBlade.esp
in your Data files.

5.Visit a smith and forge a sword under the Elven section you will find the 
sword 
1.Elven Great Blade to forge
2.Elven Great Wings Blade to forge
3.Elven Great Blood Blade to forge

sword can be forged sometimes even to buy by the smith in next locations
- Riverwood
- Whiterun
- Makarath
- Solitude
- Windhelm

Un-Installation Instructions:
______________________________

Remove the checkmark from ElvenGreatBlade.esp in the
data files at start of the Skyrim launcher

If you would also like to remove the files

delate the folder ElvenGreatBlade from the data\\meshes\\weapons
and the folder ElvenGreatBlade from the data\\textures\\weapons
and the file ElvenGreatBlade.esp from the data folder

Permision fom me: *****Cokla*******
You can do whatever you like with the mod and the meshes and textures 
as long you credit original avtor ****Razorpony******
=================================================================================================================
